skillTree.localised_description: In life first company proudly rode their gigantic Aurochs into battle. In undeath the rage and shame felt at their loss was great, causing many to use forbidden magics to raise their companions once again.

attributes.bullet_text:
Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus
This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit can pass through trees.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

skillTree.localised_description: Insult to injury that is - A state troop witnessing a catpured war wagon decimate a cohort further down field

skillTree.localised_description: Veterans of dozens of conflicts, the Dusk Reaver chain of command knows where and when to find the best loot.

effects.description: Spoils of Conquest generated: 2 per turn
Spoils of Conquest generated: 4 per turn
Spoils of Conquest generated: 6 per turn

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: It's An Endless Abyss
"Took this here beaut ofa artillary officer from some place called Cathay. Them snobby imperialist sure know how ta make a noice gun."
"Uncanny they are, seen em pierce the hide of them dinos like a hot needle through a piece a cheese." "Needle?" "Cheese?" "Shut it or its sand baggin duty for tha lot of ya."
"Bring the Barag forwards! Hand me that spyglass!"

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

skillTree.localised_description: "Stand Back! Them bearded runts sure know how to make a thing go bang, for betta or for worse."

unit_ability.onscreen_name: "Stand Back! Them bearded runts sure know how to make a thing go bang, for betta or for worse."

skillTree.localised_description: Oi! Load the the guided ones next, we're gonna wipe that smug look off that ones face ova there!

Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: A vile wave indeed, the creeping things that nest in the decaying undergrowth swarm all over the foe.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Viletide Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.
These pathetic creatures fought to the last.. Would be a shame to let their just.. Go to waste

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawned unit fights in this battle only
Spawned unit fights in this battle only

skillTree.localised_description: The tidal currents shall slow the foe's advance.

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Tidecall Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Sheer, undiluted spite sharpens the dead eye further.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Spiteful Shot"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Spiteful Shot Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Spiteful Shot Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Kadon, a master of forms, was able to shift his shape into anything he chose. Here, his magic is used to summon a Skeletal Carnosaur, as if Kadon himself fights for you.
"Yes, they’re from the east. Annoying, yet useful - their hides, particularly…"
If there's swash to be buckled, this one will be right at the front, in the thick of the fray.
Strike hard, strike true.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
This traditional trapper's tool is a noose made from wire; if the foe struggles, it simply tightens, cutting into the flesh.
Death is always just a shot away.
"It's got a few secret ingredients. No, I won't tell you what they are, but the results will speak for themselves."
"Get more ammo up here, NOW!!!!!!!!"
"The recoil's a nightmare, but you can't deny the end result!"
Bears, Orcs, Kroxigor - prey-size is not a hindrance to the master hunter.
Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Glory in your dark majesty, my lord."
Vampires and their liche-servants are devious creatures; manipulative with many mortal servants in their thrall.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.
